discourse_list.title: Know Your MIP #17 - MIP93: Utilizing Hats Protocol

content.content: Know Your MIP #17 | MIP93: Utilizing Hats Protocol      For the Know Your MIP series’ 17th session, we will be walking through MIP93: Utilizing Hats Protocol. This is a proposal by @prose11 for utilizing the Hats Protocol; a Protocol that allows for real-time, on-chain, verifiable roles to be maintained throughout the Maker Protocol. Although eligible to enter the January Governance Cycle, this MIP will remain in RFC for now. Sharpen your minds and bring in as many input as it flows!    If you can’t make to the call, post any questions you may have and we will make sure to address them during the Q&A period!  Join us! @prose11 will host   Agenda:   MIP93 presentation by @prose11  Q&A session   When Time in your local-timezone format: 2023-01-11T16:00:00Z Mark it on your Google Calendar!  Where Join Zoom Meeting  Call Recording Will be uploaded shortly after the call is over Attn: @Recognized-Delegates, @Core-Facilitators

We have decided to postpone this call for next week to get more attendance. The event has been updated on the calendar. We apologize for the short notice. Thank you! @Recognized-Delegates @Core-Facilitators
